anchorRef: Penei Moshe on Jerusalem Talmud Shekalim 3:3:1
anchorRefExpanded: Penei Moshe on Jerusalem Talmud Shekalim 3:3:1
he: תַּנֵּי. שֶׁלְבֵּית רַבָּן גַּמְלִיאֵל עִיבְּרוּהָ בְמוֹצָאֵי שְׁבִיעִית מִיָּד.
text: The Gemara adds: It was taught in a baraita that the court of the house of Rabban Gamliel intercalated the year immediately after the Sabbatical Year, in the first month of that year.
